statements: UPDATE user_permissions SET access_level = 2, server_permissions = '{"read": true, "write": false}' WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE user_permissions SET content_permissions = '{}', access_level = 1 WHERE user_id = 202
UPDATE user_permissions SET access_level = 3, server_permissions = '{"read": true, "write": false}' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_permissions SET content_permissions = '{"view": true, "edit": true}', access_level = 5 WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE user_permissions SET permission_level = 2, access_level = 1 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE game_servers SET player_count = 50, server_location = 'Europe' WHERE server_id = 456;
UPDATE user_permissions SET access_level = 2, permission_level = 1 WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE game_servers SET player_count = player_count + 1, server_location = 'Europe' WHERE server_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET password = 'newpassword123' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE permissions SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE permission_id = 'abcd1234-abcd-1234-abcd-1234abcd1234';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE game_servers SET server_location='Europe' WHERE server_id=5;
UPDATE user_permissions SET access_level = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 1 AND game_server_id = 3;

UPDATE roles SET role_description = 'Updated role description' WHERE role_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET access_level = 2 WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE roles SET role_description = 'Super Admin Role' WHERE role_name = 'admin';
